title: nOrMaL, Shrkrelief 4.10.20
itunes:title: nOrMaL, Shrkrelief 4.10.20
description:
In episode 606, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and writer Michael Swaim to discuss when things will go back to normal and what the new normal will be, Martin Shkreli wanting to be let out of jail to find a cure for coronavirus, a murder plot involving an ex-NFL player, Vulture movie club, quarantine activities, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Wuhan Gradually Returns To Everyday Life. But It’s Not The Same As Before.
  2. Martin Shkreli Wants Out Of Prison To Save Us All From The Coronavirus
  3. Ex-NFL star Chris Johnson accused in murder-for-hire shootings
  4. It’s Only Fitting That We All Watch Parasite This Friday
  5. WATCH: Mos Def 'If You Can Huh! You Can Hear' [1997]

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
